title: Common 1970s and 1980s ad typeface
content:
It looks like a sans serif version of Belwe Bold, which was very often used by Apple in the 80s.

Font: 

 Kabel Black

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131637/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
